content: single_crochet in last chain work across the bottom of foundation chain --> single_crochet in color each row is highlighted in next 6 chs turn = 19 sts different color row 2 ws chain 1 do not count as a st here & color throughout fpsc around post of next st 17 times photos a-1 & a-2 page 4 turn = 17 sts row 3 rs chain 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 5 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 6 sts turn = 19 sts canadian maple leaf coaster / appliqué | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 1 margaid © irarott increase 2016 4 egap row 4-7 repeat 2 more times row 2 & 3 row 8 same as row 2 finishing fasten_off leaving a long tail for sew- ing weave in the end from the beg turn & place a marker in 9th st from finish- ing photo a-3 assembling a-1 maple leaf place all small leaves next to each other with the markers meeting in the center photo b-1 b-1 a-2 with ws facing you whip stitch the leaves to- gether across 9 sts on the sides photo b-2 re- move markers as you go from the left and right leaves but keep the middle marker weave in a-3 the ends on ws b-2 canadian maple leaf coaster / appliqué | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 5 egap leaf stalk make 1 diagram 2 page 7 to beg holding the leaf with rs facing you & with the center marker facing up work c-2 chain 4 photo c-1 row 1 rs work across the top 9 sts of right small leaf --> single_crochet in first st on the right photo c-2 single_crochet in next 6 sts decrease skip st with marker & remove the mark- er photo c-3 work across the top 9 sts of left small leaf --> decrease single_crochet in next 7 sts chain 5 photo c-4 turn = 16 sts & 2 chs on each side row 2 ws single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in next 3 chs single_crochet in next 6 sts sc4tog single_crochet in next 6 sts single_crochet in next 4 chs photo c-5 page 6 turn = 21 sts c-3 row 3 rs chain 1 do not count as a st bpsc around post of next st 10 times chain 10 photo c-6 page 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in next 8 chs photo c-7 page 6 bpsc around post of next st 10 times slip_stitch in last st photo c-8 page 6 = 30 sts finishing fasten_off & weave in all the ends on ws c-1 c-4 canadian maple leaf coaster / appliqué | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 6 egap c-5 c-8 c-6 wet blocking wet blocking is optional but recommended blocking removes creases & adjusts the shape of crochet pieces 1 soak
